headline: PPG recognized on Fortune magazine’s ‘World’s Most Admired Companies’ list for 18th consecutive year
summary: PITTSBURGH, January 21, 2026--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that it was recognized by Fortune magazine on its World’s Most Admired Companies List for the 18th year in a row. The list, considered the ultimate corporate reputation indicator, identifies the largest, best-regarded companies across 51 industries as voted on by industry peers.
